Class FuzzyLocation

java.lang.Object
org.jscience.geography.FuzzyLocation
public class FuzzyLocation extends Object
Represents a geographic location with uncertainty.

Historical and archaeological locations often have imprecise coordinates. FuzzyLocation supports:

  • Exact coordinates (latitude/longitude)
  • Named regions and areas
  • Uncertainty radius
  • Historical boundaries that may have changed

Since:
1.0
Author:
Silvere Martin-Michiellot, Gemini AI (Google DeepMind)

    • distanceTo

      public double distanceTo(FuzzyLocation other)
      Calculates approximate distance to another location in kilometers. Uses Haversine formula.
      Parameters:
      other - the other location
      Returns:
      distance in km, or NaN if coordinates unavailable
